Release LTS.388.4 of November 08, 2023
New features
New Stripe-based payment widget added.
New Edoc functionality added, files can be downloaded with bookmark markup.
Object e-mail logging added, incoming/outgoing messages can be viewed directly from the System.
Images sent via notification template are now displayed in letters received by mail.
Changes and improvements
Security of algorithm interactions with application classes improved;
File signature checks improved;
Display of dynamic chart settings after refreshing the page stabilized;
Display of pictures in "Image" widget improved;
Search filters stabilized;
Printed form editor improved;
Display of pictures in headers/footers in Edoc stabilized;
"Figure" widget in mobile app optimized, now it has default value when added to workspace.
